example.eg: He maintained a rate of 40 pages per hour.
example.egtrans: 他保持每小时40页的速度。

example.eg: The mechanic maintained all the vehicles in the fleet.
example.egtrans: 修理工对车队所有车辆进行了维修。

example.eg: He maintained that the shooter was wearing a black sweater.
example.egtrans: 他坚称枪手穿着一件黑毛衣。

example.eg: He maintained a large family on his salary.
example.egtrans: 他靠着自己的薪水供养着一大家子人。

example.eg: We must maintain the strike because we can win.
example.egtrans: 罢工必须继续下去，我们能赢。

example.eg: The hospital aims to maintain the highest standards in health care.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 保证最高标准, 保证最好质量

example.eg: She maintained herself through a good diet and exercise.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 保持健康的身体状况, 保持身材
